name: Epic Armaments of Battle - Exalted Amongst the Dawn
tooltip:
Epic Armaments of Battle - Exalted Amongst the Dawn

For 27 Insignias of the Dawn and 27 Insignias of the Crusade you may choose an item from the Argent Dawn's treasure cache.

Requirements:
- Insignia of the Dawn x 27
- Insignia of the Crusade x 27
